text: @joncoopertweets @donlemon @CNN Dude, stop rehashing old Trump comments about coronavirus. It’s water under the bridge and everyone is tired of hearing about it. I’m not even an American and its getting old TO ME. Move on bro. Focus on the future. You’re exhausting.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Tonight
entity.description: Veteran journalist Don Lemon anchors an hourlong prime-time show bringing facts, insight and analysis to the day's biggest news stories. There's candid conversations without talking points or spin, and late-breaking news that becomes tomorrow morning's headlines.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
